Title: Relates to the residence of the part-time judge of the city court of Lackawanna; repealer
Summary: Authorizes the part-time judge of the city court of Lackawanna to reside anywhere in Erie county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform city court act, in relation to the residence of the part-time judge of the city court of Lackawanna; and repealing certain sections of such law relating thereto
